Detailed Description

This concept allows to divide application into smaller modules.

At the implementation level you don't need to care about the application topology. The topology will be described separately using .arx files and can be started using runtime environment over ACF tool or compiled to C++ code using ARXC compiler. Additionally you can use component simulation to use components as "normal" classes.
